game.name: Dead In Bermuda
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: DEAD IN BERMUDA is a survival management game with RPG and adventure elements. Lead a team of 8 survivors from a plane crash. Assign them to tasks, gain experience, develop your survival skills, research and craft new items, explore the island and solve its mysteries.
